hero.title: Software Engineer / Web Developer
hero.name: Jakkarin Mitvongsa
hero.description: A <focused>backend-focused</focused> software engineer eager to grow into <focused>fullstack development</focused>. I specialize in building reliable systems with <highlight>Node.js</highlight>, <highlight>PostgreSQL</highlight>, <highlight>MongoDB</highlight>, and <highlight>AWS services</highlight>. While backend is my primary focus, I’ve gained valuable fullstack experience through side projects with <highlight>Go</highlight>, <highlight>React</highlight>, <highlight>Next.js</highlight>, and <highlight>TypeScript</highlight>.

cta.text: Eager to bring my skills and dedication to your company's next big project.

about.title: About Me
about.personalInfoQuote: Delivering Innovative Solutions for Over 4 Years
about.personalInfoDescription: I specialize in creating intuitive websites that offer dynamic and engaging user experiences, bringing ideas to life through innovative solutions.
about.name: Jakkarin Mitvongsa
about.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

details.0: I worked on 2 projects. I was a core member in development team.
details.1: First project was building web application for e-commerce with chatbot utilizing HTML/IBM Watson Assistant/CSS/React.js/Node.js/MongoDB.
details.2: Second project worked on IoT mobile app using Arduino/C/React Native/IBM Watson IoT/Node.js/MongoDB.

details.0: Developed and maintained backend services using Node.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and AWS Lambda, enhancing system reliability and scalability.
details.1: Built an ETL pipeline to migrate data from MongoDB to Amazon Redshift using Python and AWS S3, improving data analytics by ensuring up-to-date and accurate data warehousing.
details.2: Engineered a notification and broadcast system for the LINE messaging app using Node.js, PostgreSQL, AWS Lambda, and cron jobs, improving user communication through scheduled notifications and targeted broadcasts.
details.3: Optimized analytics and reporting by introducing Apache Airflow for data rollups and migrating from Amazon Redshift to PostgreSQL, reducing query times and operational costs while improving performance.
details.4: Enhanced system security by mitigating SQL injection vulnerabilities using Prepared Statements and implementing security headers with Helmet in Node.js, strengthening overall application security.
details.5: Ventured into game development using Unity and C#, creating a mini-game in 15 days and developing cutscene scenarios, quest systems, and inventory systems in one month, demonstrating adaptability and quick learning.
details.6: Conducted load testing and performance optimization, resulting in a 132% increase in completed requests per minute and achieving 100% API success rates, ensuring high availability and reliability of services.

details.0: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

kmitl.description: I graduated from King Mongkut's Institute of Technology Ladkrabang with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science. During my studies, I developed a strong foundation in computer science and software engineering, gaining experience in programming, data structures, algorithms, and software development methodologies and more.

work.description: These projects highlight my proficiency by demonstrating my skills in action.

discord-clone.description: A Discord clone replicating core features—account creation, server/channel management, and real-time communication.

webcgp-kmitl.description: A web-based game launcher that hosts a collection of games, allowing users to play them directly in their web browser.

wasm-chat-application.description: A lightweight chat application that allows users to join chats, send messages, and receive messages in real time.

rose-chatbot.description: Rosé Chatbot is a LINE chatbot acted as an interface between a merchant and their customer.

dfs-bfs-application.description: A web application that visualizes the Depth-First Search and Breadth-First Search algorithms through maze.

nodejs-chat-application.description: Node.js Chat Application is a simple node.js chat application powered by Express and Socket.io.

mern-cart-application.description: MERNCart is a expressCart clone but recreate with MERN Stack it provide a fully functional shopping cart.

draxit.description: A real-time multiplayer web game inspired by Dixit board game, with a creative twist where players draw the cards themselves.

phaser3-webrtc.description: A proof of concept for a simple 2D multiplayer game with real-time video and audio communication.

rust-raycaster.description: A simple raycaster implemented in Rust to explore Rust programming and OpenGL graphics.

swapbook-api.description: Swapbook is a mobile application that make you can easily trade a book with another people.

cv-post-estimation.description: Human pose estimation that seeks a method that minimizes the use of Deep Learning approaches.

epic-games-auto-claim.description: Epic Games Auto Claim is a web application that automatically claims free games from the Epic Games Store on your behalf.

avalon.description: A web-based implementation of the social deduction game Avalon, built with React and Socket.io for real-time interactions.

cgp-kmitl.description: Collection of game project for learning Computer Game Programming.

webrtc-sfu.description: Go implementation of a Selective Forwarding Unit (SFU) for WebRTC. The server uses WebSocket for signaling and the Gin framework for HTTP handling.

vonder-games.description: This project is a 2D platformer developed using Unity's 2D Universal Render Pipeline and the new Input System. The game features a variety of mechanics, interactive elements.
